languages.text: "Я сделал из тебя воина Его. Все люди грешны, безгрешны лишь дикие звери, стихии, жар звезд... И я сотворил из тебя зверя Императора. Стихию правосудия Его. Жар гнева Защитника Человечества. Избыв в сердце твоем все страсти, кроме страсти нести Его закон, я поднял тебя над слабостями, моралью, милосердием человеческими. Ты — чудовище, прикованное к Золотому Трону и вершащее его волю. Совершенная кара".

"I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."
languages.original_text: "Я сделал из тебя воина Его. Все люди грешны, безгрешны лишь дикие звери, стихии, жар звезд... И я сотворил из тебя зверя Императора. Стихию правосудия Его. Жар гнева Защитника Человечества. Избыв в сердце твоем все страсти, кроме страсти нести Его закон, я поднял тебя над слабостями, моралью, милосердием человеческими. Ты — чудовище, прикованное к Золотому Трону и вершащее его волю. Совершенная кара".

traits.locale_text: "I made you His warrior. All humans are sinful. Only wild beasts, fiery stars, and the elements are without sin... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The star fire of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, the morality, and the mercy of humans. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and exacting its will. The perfect retribution."

The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, the morality, and the mercy of humans. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and exacting its will. The perfect retribution."

I raised you above the weaknesses, the morality, and the mercy of humans. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and exacting its will. The perfect retribution."

"I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

languages.text: “我让你成为帝皇的战士。所有人类都是有罪的，只有野兽、烈火与元素不受罪恶玷污……于是，我让你成为了帝皇的野兽，祂愤怒的烈火，以及人类守护者的正义元素。我抹除了你心中所有的激情，让你一心渴望捍卫帝皇的律法。我让你超越了人类的弱点、道德和仁慈。如今，你是一只被锁在黄金王座上的怪物，不断执行黄金王座的意志。这正是完美的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

traits.locale_text: “我让你成为帝皇的战士。所有人类都是有罪的，只有野兽、烈火与元素不受罪恶玷污……于是，我让你成为了帝皇的野兽，祂愤怒的烈火，以及人类守护者的正义元素。我抹除了你心中所有的激情，让你只渴望捍卫帝皇的律法。我让你超越了人类的弱点、道德和仁慈。如今，你是一只被锁在黄金王座上的怪物，不断执行黄金王座的意志。这正是完美的报应。”

languages.text: 「私はお前を、主の戦士にした。人類は皆、不義な生き物だ。野生の獣、燃える星、そして元素だけが罪を持っていない…そして私は、お前を主の獣にしてしまった。皇帝の怒りで燃える星、そして人類を守護する正義の元素。お前の心の情熱は、全て消し去った。ただ一つ残しておいたのが、主の法への情熱だった。私はお前を人間の弱さ、道徳、慈悲の上に引き上げた。お前は正に、黄金の玉座に縛られた、意思を持った化物だ。完璧なまでに、報いだ」
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「私はお前を、主の戦士にした。人類は皆、不義な生き物だ。野生の獣、炎のような星、そして元素だけが罪を持っていない…そして私は、お前を主の獣にしてしまった。皇帝の怒りの火の星、そして人類を守護する正義の元素。お前の心の情熱は、全て消し去った。ただ一つ残しておいたのが、主の法への情熱だった。私はお前を人間の弱さ、道徳、慈悲の上に引き上げた。お前は正に、黄金の玉座に縛られた、意思を持った化物だ。完璧なまでに、報いだ」

languages.text: «Os convertí en Su guerrera. Todas las personas son impías. Solo las bestias salvajes, las estrellas ardientes y los elementos están libres de maldad... y os hice la bestia del Emperador. El fuego estelar de Su ira. La justicia elemental del Protector de la Humanidad. Eliminé todas las pasiones de su corazón excepto la pasión por defender Su ley. Os elevé por encima de las debilidades, la moralidad y la misericordia humanas. Es un monstruo encadenado al Trono Dorado cumpliendo Su voluntad. El castigo perfecto».
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

traits.locale_text: «Os convertí en Su guerrera. Todos los humanos son injustos. Solo las bestias salvajes, las estrellas ardientes y los elementos están libres de pecado... Y os hice la bestia del Emperador. El fuego estelar de Su ira. La justicia elemental del Protector de la Humanidad. Eliminé todas las pasiones de su corazón excepto la pasión por defender Su ley. Os elevé por encima de las debilidades, la moralidad y la misericordia de los humanos. Es un monstruo encadenado al trono dorado cumpliendo su voluntad. El castigo perfecto».

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch zu seiner Kriegerin gemacht. Alle Völker sind unrechtschaffen. Nur die wilden Tiere, die flammenden Sterne und die Elemente sind ohne Fehler ... Und ich habe Euch zum Tier des Imperators gemacht. Zum flammenden Stern seines Zorns. Zur elementaren Gerechtigkeit des Beschützers der Menschheit. Ich habe jede Leidenschaft in Eurem Herzen niedergetrampelt, bis auf die Leidenschaft für die Aufrechterhaltung seines Gesetzes. Ich habe Euch über die Schwäche, die Moralität und die Gnade der Menschheit erhoben. Ihr seid ein Monster, das an den Goldenen Thron gekettet ist und seinen Willen umsetzt. Die perfekte Vergeltung."
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch zu seiner Kriegerin gemacht. Alle Menschen sind unrechtschaffen. Nur wilde Tiere, flammende Sterne und die Elemente sind ohne Sünde ... Und ich habe Euch zum Tier des Imperators gemacht. Zum Sternenfeuer seines Zorns. Zur elementaren Gerechtigkeit des Beschützers der Menschheit. Ich habe jede Leidenschaft in Eurem Herzen niedergetrampelt, bis auf die Leidenschaft für die Aufrechterhaltung seines Gesetzes. Ich habe Euch über die Schwäche, die Moralität und die Gnade von Menschen erhoben. Ihr seid ein Monster, das an den Goldenen Thron gekettet ist und seinen Willen umsetzt. Die perfekte Vergeltung."

languages.text: « J'ai fait de vous Sa guerrière. Tous les êtres vivants sont souillés ; seuls les bêtes sauvages, les étoiles ardentes et les éléments sont dépourvus de toute faute... Alors, j'ai fait de vous la bête de l'Empereur, l'étoile ardente de Son courroux, l'élément justicier du Protecteur de l'humanité. J'ai écrasé toutes les passions qui habitaient votre cœur, à l'exception du zèle au service de la défense de Sa loi. Je vous ai élevée au-dessus des faiblesses, de la morale et de la pitié de l'humanité. Vous êtes un monstre enchaîné au Trône d'Or et voué à exécuter Sa volonté... Vous êtes le châtiment incarné. »
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fait de vous Sa guerrière. Tous les humains sont souillés ; seuls les bêtes sauvages, les étoiles ardentes et les éléments sont dépourvus de tout péché... Alors, j'ai fait de vous la bête de l'Empereur, l'étoile éclatante de Son courroux, l'élément justicier du Protecteur de l'humanité. J'ai écrasé toutes les passions qui habitaient votre cœur, à l'exception du zèle au service de la défense de Sa loi. Je vous ai élevée au-dessus des faiblesses, de la morale et de la pitié des humains. Vous êtes un monstre enchaîné au Trône d'Or et voué à exécuter Sa volonté... Vous êtes le châtiment incarné. »

languages.text: "Seni O'nun bir savaşçısı hâline getirdim. Tamamen saf olan tek bir kimse bile yoktur. Yalnızca vahşi hayvanlar, gökyüzünde yanan yıldızlar ve doğadaki elementler hatasızdır. Ve ben seni İmparator'un vahşi hayvanına dönüştürdüm. O'nun gazabının cayır cayır yanan yıldızına dönüştürdüm. İnsanlığın Koruyucusu'nun adaletinin doğal bir elementine dönüştürdüm. Kalbindeki her türlü tutkuyu bertaraf ettim ki orada yalnızca O'nun kanunlarının müdafisi olma tutkusu kalsın. Seni insanlığın zayıflığının, ahlakının ve merhametinin üzerinde olacak şekilde yetiştirdim. Sen Altın Taht'a zincirlenmiş, onun iradesini gerçeğe dönüştüren bir canavarsın. Sen kusursuz bir cezalandırıcısın."
languages.original_text: "I made you His warrior. All people are unrighteous. Only the wild beasts, the blazing stars, and the elements are without fault... And I made you the Emperor's beast. The blazing star of His wrath. The elemental justice of the Protector of Mankind. I stamped out every passion in your heart but the passion for championing His law. I raised you above the weaknesses, morality, and mercy of humanity. You are a monster chained to the Golden Throne and enacting its will. The perfect retribution."
